title: shaka-player
description: JavaScript player library / DASH client / MSE-EME player

title: dash.js
description: dash.js is an initiative of the DASH Industry Forum to establish a production quality framework for building video and audio players that play back MPEG-DASH content using client-side JavaScript libraries leveraging the Media Source Extensions API set as defined by the W3C.
